self_predictions.prediction_summary: Michael believes he is stronger and more prepared than in his previous match with Genadi. He acknowledges Genadi's strength but is confident in his improved form and strategy.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Michael plans to use strong riser, pronation, back pressure, and cup to defeat Genadi, avoiding a hook unless he chooses to go into it.

Genadi Kvikvinia.health: Recovered from bicep surgery, expected to be in top form
Genadi Kvikvinia.previous_match_summary: Genadi defeated Michael in their last encounter by exploiting technical errors and fatigue.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Michael did not explicitly predict but implied Todd's experience and strength would be key.
Michael did not explicitly predict but discussed Devon's strength and form.

Devon Larratt.strength: Very strong, especially with added weight

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin believes Michael is in the best mental and physical shape of his career and sees this as the biggest match on the card.

Michael Todd.strength: Stronger than ever, with improved form
Michael Todd.health: Recovered from surgery, in top shape
Michael Todd.previous_match_summary: Michael has been focusing on a comeback and is highly motivated.

Genadi Kvikvinia.strength: Very strong, especially in explosive hits
Genadi Kvikvinia.health: Recovered from bicep surgery, expected to be strong
Genadi Kvikvinia.previous_match_summary: Genadi has a history of strong performances and a warrior spirit.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin thinks Corey has a good chance if he can match Kamil's strength and use his side pressure effectively.

Corey West.strength: Strong, especially with left arm pronation
